MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Post office lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:12PM engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  11:22PM on 13th January 2021
